attributes.action: Change of government leadership following the loes told over partygate
attributes.additional_details: At the very least there needs to be a vote of confidence called in regards to both of them. They are incapable or running the country. These people are supposed to be trustworthy. How can they be trusted when they are partying away while people, like myself, have had to isolate for 2 years. Unable to go to visit dying relatives and friends. Unable to go to funerals. It is unacceptable and there needs to be change.
attributes.background: After Johnson and Sunak have clearly lied about parties at number 10 it's clear we can't trust either of them. They have set the laws then broken them. They need to either resign or be removed.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
